This workspace is for a cross-platform prescription-scanning app with a Flutter frontend and FastAPI backend.
Use best practices for Python (FastAPI), Flutter (Dart), and integrate Tesseract OCR, spaCy, PostgreSQL, and Firebase Auth.
Organize code into `frontend/` (Flutter) and `backend/` (FastAPI).
